mapper.select: SELECT t.ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId, t.user_id AS userId, SUM(b.BALANCE)AS balance FROM tb_pay_account t ,tb_pay_account_book b WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.record_status = 1 and b.is_show = 2 and b.ACCOUNT_ID = t.ACCOUNT_ID and t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.account_id as accountId, b.ac_book_id as acBookId, b.ac_book_name as acBookName, b.ac_book_type as acBookType, b.balance as balance, b.automatic_deductions as automaticDeductions, b.can_recharge as canRecharge, b.is_show as isShow, b.created_time as createdTime, b.creator_account as creatorAccount, b.modified_time as modifiedTime, b.modifier_account as modifierAccount, b.record_status as recordStatus, t.ac_book_desc as acBookDesc, t.ac_book_scope as acBookScope from tb_pay_account_book b, tb_pay_account_book_type t WHERE 1=1 and b.ac_book_type = t.ac_book_type and b.record_status = 1 and b.is_show = 2 and account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT b.deduction_id AS deductionId, b.bill_id AS billId, b.ac_book_id AS acBookId, b.remark AS remark, CASE b.payment_method WHEN '1' THEN '钱包' WHEN '2' THEN '微信' WHEN '3' THEN '支付宝' WHEN '4' THEN '银联' ELSE '支付方式异常' END paymentMethod, CASE b.payment_action WHEN '1' THEN '手动支付' WHEN '2' THEN '自动付款' ELSE '支付类型异常' END paymentAction, CASE b.nature_code WHEN '1' THEN '充值' WHEN '2' THEN '扣费' ELSE '支付类型异常' END natureCode, b.money AS money, b.balance AS balance, b.created_time AS createdTime, b.creator_account AS creatorAccount, b.record_status AS recordStatus, b.modified_time AS modifiedTime, b.modifier_account AS modifierAccount, CASE t.payment_state WHEN '1' THEN '已支付' WHEN '2' THEN '待支付' ELSE '支付异常' END paymentState FROM tb_pay_account_book_money_record b, tb_pay_bill t WHERE 1 =1 and b.record_status = 1 AND b.bill_id = t.bill_id and b.deduction_id = #{deductionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT b.deduction_id AS deductionId, b.bill_id AS billId, b.ac_book_id AS acBookId, b.remark AS remark, CASE b.payment_method WHEN '1' THEN '钱包' WHEN '2' THEN '微信' WHEN '3' THEN '支付宝' WHEN '4' THEN '银联' ELSE '支付方式异常' END paymentMethod, CASE b.payment_action WHEN '1' THEN '手动支付' WHEN '2' THEN '自动付款' ELSE '支付类型异常' END paymentAction, CASE b.nature_code WHEN '1' THEN '充值' WHEN '2' THEN '扣费' ELSE '支付类型异常' END natureCode, b.money AS money, b.balance AS balance, b.created_time AS createdTime, b.creator_account AS creatorAccount, b.record_status AS recordStatus, b.modified_time AS modifiedTime, b.modifier_account AS modifierAccount, CASE t.payment_state WHEN '1' THEN '已支付' WHEN '2' THEN '待支付' ELSE '支付异常' END paymentState, t.AC_BOOK_TYPE as acBookType FROM tb_pay_account_book_money_record b, tb_pay_bill t WHERE 1 =1 and b.record_status = 1 AND b.bill_id = t.bill_id and b.ac_book_id = #{acBookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by b.created_time desc
